attributes.action: increase the amount of bio diesel being produced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more outlets are need that produce and sell bio diesel, it sells for around 25 pence per ltr cheaper than city diesel and is more afordable to the every day car user, it also helps our haulage firms compete with overseas lorries that use low duty fuel bought abroad, the goverment could help local farmers move into this area of production, and grants should be made avalible to them to do so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
